Peliculas

  • {{peli.id}}, {{peli.titulo}}, {{peli.descripcion}}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Peliculas } from '../peliculas'; import { PELIS } from '../mock-pelis'; import { ImdbService } from '../imdb.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-peliculas', templateUrl: './peliculas.component.html', styleUrls: ['./peliculas.component.css'] }) export class PeliculasComponent { public peliculas : any; constructor(private _service: ImdbService ){ } mostrarPelis(): void{ this._service.getPeliculas().subscribe(res=>{ this.peliculas = res.data; }, error =>{ console.log("ERROR") }) } }
